Package windowing

Class Windowing

  • java.lang.Object
    • windowing.Windowing
  • public final class Windowing
extends java.lang.Object
    The Windowing class represents the main class of the application. It is responsible for parsing the input file, storing the segments, constructing the vertical and horizontal priority search trees, and calling the windowing algorithm to find the segments that intersect the chosen window.

      • choseSize

        public boolean choseSize​(double chosen_min_x,
                         double chosen_max_x,
                         double chosen_min_y,
                         double chosen_max_y)
        The function sets the value of the variables `chosen_min_x`, `chosen_max_x`, `chosen_min_y` and `chosen_max_y`.
        Parameters:
        chosen_min_x - The value of the variable `chosen_min_x`.
        chosen_max_x - The value of the variable `chosen_max_x`.
        chosen_min_y - The value of the variable `chosen_min_y`.
        chosen_max_y - The value of the variable `chosen_max_y`.
        Returns:
        The method returns true if the chosen window is within the window size, and false otherwise.

      • requestLines

        public java.lang.String requestLines()
        The function requests and displays line segments within a specified window using a windowing algorithm.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a string that contains information about the window size and the number of reported segments.
